page.title: 16MALBOROUGH VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {The village hall}was opened in{1975. At the ridge of the roof it is{25 feet high and at the eaves it is{16 feet. The size of the main hall is{75 feet by{40 feet.}The size ofthe kitchen area is{25 feet}by{45 feet.}The original building cost was{Â£22,365. The tarmac car park next to it belongs to the{South Hams District Council. The hall was built by{Mr.A.Taylor. The land was bought in{1947}for{Â£866. {The Playing Field}was five and a half acres but half an acre has been lost to roadworks. A wall has been built by the southside. Some part of the playing field is used for a childrens' play area.
